Package Handler

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AudioHandler
    The class responsible for playing all audio in the game.
    CharacterHandler
    This class will read from a text file, creating all the characters supplied within the file.
    CharacterImageHandler
    This class provides the user with an image of the NPC character given its current state.
    ItemHandler
    This class will read from a text file, creating all the items supplied within the file.
    ItemImageHandler
    This class provides the user with an image of a given item.
    PlayerImageHandler
    This class provides the user with an image of the player character given its current state.
    QuestHandler
    This class will read from a text file, creating all the quests supplied within the file.
    TileImageHandler
    This class will read all the tileimages in a specific directory.
    TimeHandler
    Contains static methods related to time management.
